body_html:
Thanks for your offer to assist @kmalakoff !

@andydavis1 and @suharshs have been slowly chugging along gradients in C++ (using the REGISTER_OP_GRADIENT macro). The broad plan is to (1) have gradients for every op registered in C++, (2) Add a C API call equivalent of tf.gradients that uses these.

@andydavis1 or @suharshs might have suggestions on the most effective way for you to contribute towards this.
